data.title: History of the Chicago and Rockford Weather Observation Sites
data.text:
Previously was the official observation site for Chicago. Observations continued local site’s climate record.

1/1/1916

and

7/1/1942

Temporarily was the official observation site for Chicago. Observations continued local site’s climate record.

Previously was the official observation site for Chicago. Observations continued local site’s climate record.

Continuation of MDW climate records. Became the official observation site for Chicago on 7/1/1942.

Continuation of MDW climate records after the official observation site for Chicago was transferred to O’Hare

Regular observations resumed at Midway Airport after an Automated Surface Observing System (ASOS) was installed
